bug.short_desc: Demobrowser, apiviewer, testrunner apps don't run over file protocol in Chrome 5

long_desc.thetext:
Running demobrowser I have in console
Could not load from file: script/demodata.json
message, which is from qx.io.remote.transport.XmlHttp. Running testrunner I've
Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame with URL file:///<path>/test/html/tests-source.html?testclass=app.test from frame with URL file:///<path>/test/index-source.html#. Domains, protocols and ports must match.
Apiviewer fails with
Request qx.io.remote.Request[f8] handler _oncompleted threw an error: SyntaxError: Unexpected token ) Could not load from file: null
I've had Chrome 1, which was working correctly via file protocol. For me actually, Chrome is very specific purpose tool in my qooxdoo-related development view. The purpose is to view api and demos, because they make Firefox feel less responsive. Obviously, this has some irony ;)

Thanks for the report. This is a known issue and a "feature" by chrome (see bug #3622 for details). Sorry but we can't do much about it currently.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 3622 ***
